name: Filaments
description:
Stroll through tangled paths floating in extradimensional space. Activate all of the shrines to open a portal to the next world!

Made in Unity for the Summer 2018 PROCJAM. Terrain segment models were created in Blender; shrines and architectural elements are programmatically generated.

Hint: if you get stuck, frustrated, or just want to see more levels, you can press N to generate a new world.
